verbs.description: mychal kendricks [V: could] be taken off suspended list very very soon seattle seahawks linebacker mychal kendricks is currently suspended indefinitely by the nfl after pleading guilty to insider trading but that could soon change kendricks met with nfl commissioner roger goodell last week to discuss his reinstatement seahawks head coach pete carroll who also met with goodell about this recently passed that information along to reporters during the week espn adam schefter confirmed it was the first time adam schefter nfl national football league seattle seahawks roger goodell seahawks mychal kendricks seattle
